member.name: T:EventBus.Core.Configuration.EventBusOptions
member.summary: Configuration options for the event bus

member.name: P:EventBus.Core.Configuration.EventBusOptions.Prefix
member.summary: Prefix for all queue/exchange names (useful for multi-tenant scenarios)

member.name: P:EventBus.Core.Configuration.EventBusOptions.EnableIdempotency
member.summary: Whether to enable idempotency checking

member.name: P:EventBus.Core.Configuration.EventBusOptions.IdempotencyTtl
member.summary: How long to keep idempotency records (to prevent memory leaks)

member.name: P:EventBus.Core.Configuration.EventBusOptions.RetryPolicy
member.summary: Retry policy for failed message processing

member.name: P:EventBus.Core.Configuration.EventBusOptions.EnableDeadLetterQueue
member.summary: Whether to enable dead letter queue

member.name: P:EventBus.Core.Configuration.EventBusOptions.MaxMessageSizeBytes
member.summary: Maximum message size in bytes (0 = no limit)

member.name: P:EventBus.Core.Configuration.EventBusOptions.MessageTtl
member.summary: Message time-to-live (how long messages remain in queue before expiring)

member.name: P:EventBus.Core.Configuration.EventBusOptions.ConcurrentConsumers
member.summary: Number of concurrent consumers per subscription

member.name: P:EventBus.Core.Configuration.EventBusOptions.PrefetchCount
member.summary: Prefetch count for message batching (broker-specific)

member.name: P:EventBus.Core.Configuration.EventBusOptions.AutoDeleteQueues
member.summary: Whether to auto-delete queues when no consumers are connected

member.name: P:EventBus.Core.Configuration.EventBusOptions.DurableQueues
member.summary: Whether queues should be durable (survive broker restarts)

member.name: P:EventBus.Core.Configuration.EventBusOptions.PublishTimeout
member.summary: Timeout for publish operations

member.name: P:EventBus.Core.Configuration.EventBusOptions.UsePublisherConfirms
member.summary: Whether to use publisher confirms (RabbitMQ-specific, ensures message delivery)

member.name: T:EventBus.Core.Configuration.TelemetryOptions
member.summary: Telemetry and metrics options

member.name: P:EventBus.Core.Configuration.TelemetryOptions.EnableTracing
member.summary: Whether to enable distributed tracing

member.name: P:EventBus.Core.Configuration.TelemetryOptions.EnableMetrics
member.summary: Whether to enable metrics collection

member.name: P:EventBus.Core.Configuration.TelemetryOptions.LogMessagePayloads
member.summary: Whether to log message payloads (disable for sensitive data)

member.name: P:EventBus.Core.Configuration.TelemetryOptions.ServiceName
member.summary: Service name for distributed tracing

member.summary: The original event that failed

member.summary: Number of times processing was attempted

member.summary: Exception details from the last failed attempt

member.summary: Stack trace from the last failed attempt

member.summary: When the message was first enqueued

member.name: P:EventBus.Core.DeadLetter.DeadLetterMessage.DeadLetterTime
member.summary: When the message was moved to dead letter queue

member.name: P:EventBus.Core.DeadLetter.DeadLetterMessage.Reason
member.summary: Reason why the message was dead lettered

member.name: P:EventBus.Core.DeadLetter.DeadLetterMessage.Metadata
member.summary: Additional context about the failure

member.name: T:EventBus.Core.DeadLetter.DeadLetterReason
member.summary: Reason why a message was moved to dead letter queue

member.name: F:EventBus.Core.DeadLetter.DeadLetterReason.MaxRetryAttemptsExceeded
member.summary: Maximum retry attempts exceeded

member.name: F:EventBus.Core.DeadLetter.DeadLetterReason.MessageExpired
member.summary: Message expired before it could be processed

member.summary: Malformed message that cannot be deserialized

member.name: F:EventBus.Core.DeadLetter.DeadLetterReason.NonRetryableException
member.summary: Handler threw a non-retryable exception

member.name: F:EventBus.Core.DeadLetter.DeadLetterReason.Manual
member.summary: Manually moved to dead letter by operator

member.summary: Service for managing dead letter messages

member.summary: Service for ensuring idempotent message processing Prevents duplicate processing of the same event

member.name: M:EventBus.Core.Idempotency.IIdempotencyService.IsProcessedAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Checks if an event has already been processed
member.returns: True if already processed, false otherwise

member.name: M:EventBus.Core.Idempotency.IIdempotencyService.MarkAsProcessedAsync(System.String,System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Marks an event as processed

member.name: M:EventBus.Core.Idempotency.IIdempotencyService.TryAcquireProcessingLockAsync(System.String,System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Attempts to acquire a lock for processing an event This is an atomic operation that both checks and marks in one step
member.returns: True if lock acquired (event not processed), false if already processed

member.name: T:EventBus.Core.Idempotency.InMemoryIdempotencyService
member.summary: In-memory implementation of idempotency service Suitable for single-instance scenarios or testing For distributed systems, use Redis or similar

member.summary: Maximum number of retry attempts

member.summary: Initial delay before first retry

member.summary: Maximum delay between retries (for exponential backoff)

member.summary: Backoff multiplier for exponential backoff

member.summary: Whether to use exponential backoff

member.summary: Whether to add jitter to prevent thundering herd

member.summary: Action to take when all retries are exhausted

member.summary: Action to take when retry attempts are exhausted

member.summary: Move the message to a dead letter queue for manual inspection

member.summary: Discard the message

member.name: F:EventBus.Core.Retry.RetryExhaustedAction.RequeueIndefinitely
member.summary: Re-queue the message with no limit (dangerous!)
